title: Dancing in the street: a rock and roll history
creator_credit: David Espar, Hugh Thompson, WGBH (Boston) and BBC
brief_description: An outstanding documentary series examining the history of rock and roll which contains in-depth interviews with pivotal figures in rock and roll history and rare footage of performances by legendary artists. The research and in-depth analysis make this worth watching.
title_for_label: Dancing in the street: a rock and roll history
